title: Spicy Baked Cauliflower and Sweet Potatoes
directions: Add all ingredients to a 9x13 glass baking dish. Mix well.
Place in oven to cook for 30-35 minutes until sweet potatoes are tender.
Eat up! Oh you so spicy!
ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, stem and leaves removed, roughly chopped,
4 tablespoons fat of choice, melted (i used bacon fat)
